shows.title: Food Freedom / Time Slips
shows.first_half: Farmer and author Joel Salatin discussed the state of America's food system and the challenges facing farmers today. Followed by metaphysical sci-fi author R.M. Almonte, who explored the phenomenon of time slips and time travel.

shows.title: Mental Time Travel / Demonic Hauntings
shows.first_half: First Half: Author and retired professor Anthony Hamilton will discuss neuroplasticity and 'mental time travel.' These two discoveries were made in the mid-1990s using fMRI to examine people’s brains as they thought. He'll explain how these findings relate to the ancient "mystery schools" and detail the science behind them.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Author Rebecca Pittman will discuss legends and true stories of mystery, horror, and hauntings. She'll bring us the details of such events as the Smurl family haunting, the Bell Witch, and the Enfield poltergeist, as well as talk about the lives of Ed and Lorraine Warren.

shows.title: Lost Knowledge / Exoconsciousness
shows.guests: Jack R. Bialik, Rebecca Hardcastle Wright
shows.first_half: First Half: Global thought leader Jack R. Bialik will discuss how, throughout history, humanity has repeatedly made significant advancements in knowledge, only to lose it and rediscover it centuries later.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Author and futurist Rebecca Hardcastle Wright, PhD, will discuss her work in "exoconsciousness"-- supporting co-creation between human and off-planet or extraterrestrial intelligences. She advocates for the advancement and preservation of natural human consciousness and free will as we move into the technological future.

shows.title: JFK Assassination Special XVII
shows.first_half: First Half: November 22nd is the 62nd anniversary of the Kennedy assassination, considered one of the greatest conspiracies of all time. Investigative reporter Mark Shaw will start off our JFK Special and share his work and research into what really happened that fateful afternoon in Dallas in 1963, and the connections between other significant events and murders.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Author Jerome Corsi will continue the discussion on the Kennedy assassination, presenting his analysis of the JFK autopsy X-rays, the number of shots that were fired at the President, and the Warren Commission’s final report.

shows.title: Freemasonry & the Paranormal / Open Lines
shows.first_half: Author, lecturer, and hypnotist Angel Millar joins guest host Rich Berra (email) for a conversation about Freemasonry and the paranormal, as well as personal and professional growth in this time of chaos and unpredictability. Followed by Open Lines in the latter half. Give Rich a call and discuss whatever is on your mind!
